dt: {bc}an external chiefly connective tissue covering of an organ
{bc}the external coat of a blood vessel

et: borrowed from New Latin, alteration of Latin {it}adventīcia{/it}, neuter plural of {it}adventīcius{/it} "coming from outside, external" {ma}{mat|adventitious|}{/ma}
shortdef: an external chiefly connective tissue covering of an organ; especially : the external coat of a blood vessel
